items.sentence: The hotel that we stayed in had a swimming pool.
The swimming pool doesn't open for another hour.
This is one of the nicest restaurants in Boston.
I'll return to Australia the day after tomorrow.
I keep this bottle separate from all the others.
I camped near the ruins of an abandoned village.
I wish I had the courage to express my feelings.
I took it for granted that Tom wouldn't do that.
There was a murmur of excitement from the crowd.
Tom has to go to Boston before going to Chicago.
